Sequence Information.Peptide Name: PGLa-SE1 (PGLa-SP1; Ala-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXA; UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: Cameroon Clawed Frog, the tetraploid frogSilurana epitropicalisSE1, andSilurana paratropicalis, Africa

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: weakly active against E. coli (MIC 80 uM) and S.aureus (MIC 160 uM).Toxicity:  Less hemo.lytic (HC50>160 uM). Found in multiple species. Updated Jan2015; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Mechkarska M, Prajeep M, Sonnevend A, Coquet L, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H, King JD.2012, United Arab Emirates, Asia
Literature Information.Title: Host-defense peptides in skin secretions of the tetraploid frog Silurana epitropicalis with potent activity against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA)
